info.title: SECIB
info.description: The SECIB connector allows SECIB users to automate their workflow. For instance, you can trigger a worklflow when a new case file is created in SECIB neo.

get.description: allows the recovery of a case file wich is corresponding to an identifier specified in parameter.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: An integer used as an identifier for the case file.

dateCreation.description: Creation date of the case file.
dateCreation.title: Creation date

dateModification.description: Last modification date of the case file.
dateModification.title: Modification date

dossierHypertextLink.description: Hypertext link of the case file.
dossierHypertextLink.title: Hypertext link

utilisateurId.description: Identifier of the lead attorney on the case file.

siteId.description: Identifier of the lead attorney's site.
siteId.title: Site's identifier

nom.description: Lastname of the case file's lead attorney.
nom.title: Lead attorney's lastname

prenom.title: Lead attorney's firstname

nomComplet.description: Fullname of the case file's lead attorney.
nomComplet.title: Lead attorney's fullname

email.description: Email of the case file's lead attorney.
email.title: Lead attorney's email

login.description: Login of the case file's lead attorney.
login.title: Lead attorney's login

responsable.description: Lead attorney of the case file.

get.description: Retrieve data from a view in the SECIB database, using a where clause.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the view in the SECIB database.

parameters.name: cabinet
parameters.description: Identifier of the firm to work with.

parameters.name: columnName
parameters.description: Name of the view's column which will be used to order the result.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The where clause that will be used in the sql query (e.g. : name LIKE '%Secib%').
